title: 105_hr3688
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business tax credit for producing crude oil and natural gas from marginal wells of: (1) $3 per barrel of qualified crude oil production. And (2) $.50 per 1,000 cubic feet of qualified natural gas production. Provides: (1) a formula for reducing such credit in years in which oil and gas prices increase. And (2) an inflation adjustment for such formula. Allows such credit against the regular and minimum tax.
